output:
I could guard in the darkness see you calling my name
I hear you shout and hear you calling but it's not the same
Every word that you are throwing right into my back
Doesn't matter to me cause I'm keeping my track
Let me go, let me go, let me go, stop talking let me go
Our time together always ended up in war
Every whisper made you jealous and that from the start
It is nice to see you shouting out for throwing me out
No excuse but this time it's gonna be the last
Let me go, let me go, let me go, oh baby let me go
Now I go out in the darkness smiling back at your face
With a nice and cozy feeling after leaving your place
This world will leave me somewhere I don't really know
But it's someone, someone always makes my day somehow
Let me go, let me go, let me go, stop talking let me go
Let me go, let me go, let me go, oh baby let me go
